Articles.Content:
Perhaps there are a few people who remember me from a long ways back. Then there was the big forum crash, and a few issues that kept me away from KSP

Well I'm making my way through career mode now with disappointingly few explosions (maybe I've just gotten too good), so I'll be hanging around here again. Well... at least a little anyway. Never make promises you're too lazy to keep!

Hello. Welcome back. I hope your problems are resolved soon.

(About the explosions, just point the SRBs towards a vital part of the rocket. It should help. )
